Articles.Content:
There's a lot of parts in bdarmory you can use to build your life annihilator, but there's no any contracts available where you can destroy vessels. You can spawn armed vessels by your own, but this is uncomfortable. 

How hard to create a mod which creates different armed vessels around Kerbin and orders to destroy them for reward?

1 hour ago, CrazyGreenPilot_RUS said:

but there's no any contracts available where you can destroy vessels.

Contract Configurator does have the TargetDestroyed Parameter so theoretically a contract could be created listing a number of VesselIdentifiers that need to be taken out to succeed. 

Not my cup of tea, but it could be done.  See:  https://github.com/jrossignol/ContractConfigurator/wiki/TargetDestroyed-Parameter

Edited August 31, 2022 by Caerfinon
